notes.text:
• Gods of Aventuria I and Aventurian Magic I (german only) available. Special thanks to Gunthgard for his tremendous help!
  • English core rules module
  • Merchants can now be created
  • Rolls without an actor
  • Input manual rolls (rolled on your table).

• The journal browser is now available in the journals directory, to assist you on the usage of rule and adventure modules.
  • Everything can now have an active effect and modify the actor's character data.
  • Spells can now apply their effect on a target and automatically add things like Axxeleratus or conditions

Thanks to our voluntary helpers and the constant feedback of the community!

• Foundry is finally ready for 0.8.x
  • Characters can now be migrated! Automatically get updated features from spells and abilities
  • Containers can now be used
  • Equipment can now be enchanted to create Artifacts!
  • The new token bar next to the hotbar helps you find quick access to skills (we will update skill icons soon too)
  • Abilities can now be connected to sounds. Let your players hear the their enemies steal rattling down on their heads!
  • Aventurian Magic 2, Aventurian Bestiary 2 and the Drachenritter campaign are now available
  • English core rules module available in the US store
  • And big thanks to all our voluntary helpers!
